name: Pesto Pasta with Chicken
author: Kristin
summary: Easy and delicious pasta with chicken. Serve with crusty bread and salad for a quick dinner. Use as much or as little pesto sauce as you like. Using homemade pesto will taste even better, but it adds to prep time. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2  boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
crushed red pepper flakes to taste
⅓ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Saute garlic until tender, then stir in chicken
Cook until chicken is golden, and cooked through
In a large bowl, combine pasta, chicken, sun-dried tomatoes and pesto
